info.brief: Siidharth is pursuing his Master's degree in Computer Engineering from Virginia Tech and has earned his Bachelors degree from IIT Roorkee, India. He has 3 years of industry work experience as a software developer. He worked for Qualcomm as a software developer and was responsible for board bringup and linux device drivers development for Android Platform. He currently focuses on building application developement frameworks for a specific Cloud Computing paradigm known as Fog Computing.
